articles.title: Toyota Brings US Models to Japan Amid Global Sales Decline
articles.mainIdea: Toyota Brings US Models to Japan Amid Global Sales Decline
articles.summary: Zacks: Toyota Brings US Models to Japan Amid Global Sales Decline. Toyota plans to sell U.S.-built Camry, Highlander and Tundra models in Japan from 2026, following a tariff deal as global sales slip and trade ties shift. Related tickers mentioned: FUJHF, FUJHY, MZDAF, MZDAY, TOYOF.
